name: Bus Drivers
how_to_perform:
# 1. Begin by lying flat on your back, arms extended overhead and legs straight.
# 2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine, maintaining a tight, stable position throughout the movement.
# 3. Lift your shoulders off the ground and perform a crunch action, keeping your lower back pressed into the floor and your arms straight above you.
# 4. Slowly drop your shoulders down without touching them to the ground. Repeat this motion, lifting and lowering, focusing on maintaining control and engaging your core muscles.
# 5. Continue for the desired number of repetitions, pausing briefly during transitions.
short_summary: Bus drivers is an abdominal exercise that targets various muscle groups through a dynamic movement pattern.
